directions: Scoop egg yolks into a bowl; add avocado, 2/3 of chopped turkey bacon, mayonnaise, lime juice, garlic, cayenne pepper, and salt. Mash egg yolk mixture until filling is evenly combined.
Spoon filling into a piping bag or plastic bag with a snipped corner. Pipe filling into each egg white; top with a turkey bacon piece, jalapeno slice, and dash hot sauce.
ingredients: 3 slices cooked turkey bacon, chopped, divided
1 dash hot sauce, or to taste (optional)
title: Avocado Deviled Eggs
